hymn.title: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible

layout.singingstanza: Now un -- to the King e -- ter -- nal, im -- mor -- tal, in -- vis -- i -- ble, The on -- ly wise God, the on -- ly wise God, Be hon -- or and glo -- ry for -- ev -- er and ev -- er. A -- men. A -- men. Be hon -- or and glo -- ry for -- ev -- er and ev -- er. A -- men.

lyrics.stanza: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, The only wise God, the only wise God, Be honor and glory forever and ever. Amen. Amen. Be honor and glory forever and ever. Amen.
